title: The Ten Commandments: Coveting
description:
Readings from:

Exodus 20:17

Romans 13:8-10

1 Timothy 6:6-8

Hebrews 13:5

Today's passages were read by Patrice Martin, a member of Fellowship Community Church in Mount Laurel, NJ. She has served in various ministries over the years and has a passion for life and helping women and children.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
